attributes.action: Prevent Donald Trump from Entering the United Kingdom In Any Capacity
attributes.additional_details: There are past precedents for individuals being totally banned from entering the United Kingdom for having promoted hatred and intolerance.  Such banned individuals have included American 'shock-jock' Michael Savage, homophobic Westboro Baptist Church leader Fred Phelps, anti-Islamic Dutch politician Geert Wilders and so forth.  By promoting hatred through their views, they are encouraging their supporters to violate British laws on equality and tolerance.
attributes.background: Whilst I appreciate the efforts of the current petition to prevent Trump from receiving an official State Visit to prevent "embarrassment to Her Majesty the Queen", I would go further an insist that as a promoter of hatred and intolerance, Trump should not be allowed into the country whatsoever.
